website_summaries.verdict: This gummy supplement makes it easy to get your fatty acids in, with 50 milligrams of omega-3 fatty acids per gummy and no fishy taste.
pros: Omega-3 polyunsaturated fatty acids have been medically proven to boost heart health
Also provides vitamins A, C, D, and E. No HFCS, dairy, gluten, artificial sweeteners, or synthetic dyes
Designed for no fishy gas or burping
cons: Certain consumers detect an undesirable fishy taste
Too sugary sweet for some users

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Item picture says 300 mg of omega 3 per serving (two gummies). Item that arrives says 100 mg of omega 3 per serving (two gummies)
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Kopp

customer_reviews.title: best way to get your omega-3
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying to find a way to get my omega-3's in me without having to take a nasty tasting and smelling pill or capsule. These gummies are fruity, easy to chew and really work! I was having an issue with my eyes being dry and within a few days of taking them my eyes didn't have that burning itchy feeling anymore. I will definitely be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better alternative to fish oil capsules
customer_reviews.text: Because I HATE taking pills I starting using Vitafusion calcium gummies a few years ago and found them quite pleasant. When my Dr recommended an Omega 3 supplement I was very pleased to see these. The flavor is nice with no after taste. They absolutely do not taste fishy.
customer_reviews.author: PrimoCat

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor
customer_reviews.text: These have a stiffer swedish fish texture (no pun intended) and a really good flavor. I am not particularly fond of swedish fish but the lemonade flavor is something different and almost refreshing. If vitamins can be refreshing :)
customer_reviews.author: Blackcat

customer_reviews.title: Packaged very well and arrived in great condition however just a few days after opening
customer_reviews.text: Packaged very well and arrived in great condition however just a few days after opening, they seemed to melt together and get hard despite being under a tight lid. I don't know if they were old or if the Michigan humidity was to blame. Unfortunately we had to throw them out or eat them all at once in their solid blob state. Don't eat them all. You will choke.
customer_reviews.author: Imaginary Friend

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: Not the most amazing flavor I've ever had, but these could've been a LOT worse than they actually were. I didn't get any hint of a fishy flavor and haven't had any problems incorporating these into my daily vitamin regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Pianist9221

customer_reviews.title: Enh... okay
customer_reviews.text: I suppose it is definitely better than the Omega 3 pills that leave you burping fish flavored burps for the next three hours, but it does still have a faint fishy smell. Probably good for you - that part I don't know, I'm mostly just trusting... but it is easy to swallow and if you can get past the initial slight fishy smell, then it tastes fine -not necessarily as tasty as other vitamin gummies, but it's fine and not bad at all. So in comparison with omega3 pills - definitely a 5, in comparison to other overall daily vitamin gummies - probably a 3 - so we'll go with a 4.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie G

customer_reviews.title: Something hard in gummy :(
customer_reviews.text: My 4th gummy in I bit into something rock hard in the gummy. It was about the size of a corn kernel... I’m sure this is not standard and I’m sure they are normally fine but that unfortunately ruined it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TOO MUCH SUGAR
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product to anyone who is diabetic; it has 3 grams of added sugar in the form of an external coating. Other similar products do not have this unnecessary sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This really works
customer_reviews.text: I was in great need of this omega -3 and I felt a huge difference in my body, I take every day and always feel good!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: its not bad. the reason it received a 3 was because ...
customer_reviews.text: its not bad. the reason it received a 3 was because i was hoping the it taste better. vitafusions fiber and calcium taste much better. in my opinion of the 4 vitafusion i have eaten, fiber, calcium, multivitamin and omega (fish oil) here's the rank taste wise. omega<multivitamin<fiber<calcium. the calcium is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, not fishy, but price jump is sad.
customer_reviews.text: The gummies have a good, consistent texture and taste, not fishy. I initially gave the vitamins a 5-star review, but have lower that to 3-star as the price has jumped though from $8.41 per 100 in February 2020, to $20.05 per hundred in May 2020. I wanted to reorder this product because I really like it, but will find something less outrageously priced.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Vitafusion Omega 3 Gummies
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 bottles for personal use per my doctor's instruction to lower my LDL (bad cholesterol) and raise my HDL (good cholesterol). I decided on the chewable fruit-flavored gummies for a quick grab-and-go. HOWEVER, unless you like the strong taste of fish with your strawberry-banana flavored gummies then I most definitely do not recommend this product. Although I trust and regularly purchase the Vitafusion brands, I will NOT be buying the Omega 3 gummies again.
customer_reviews.author: JustTricia

customer_reviews.title: Don’t care for the sugar coating
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t care of the sugar costing on these gummy’s. I bought these for my husband who doesn’t like taking vitamins . Excellent flavor ! Excellent freshness . They seem to work great for him . I would recommend buying these for picky people .grest price and value !
customer_reviews.author: Feathers of a flock

customer_reviews.title: Gummies are melted
customer_reviews.text: The gummes are melted together to one big piece. It is impossible to eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Gemma

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take with no fishy aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: I love these gummy vitamins as I can just chew them, start absorbing them in my mouth and get them down to my stomach with nary a fishy aftertaste! They're a "sweet treat" at night for me. I love getting my Omega 3's, in this very easy to take way. I'm sure, otherwise, they would be two "horse" pills. Don't need or want that.
customer_reviews.author: goldenlvrTop Contributor: Quilting

customer_reviews.title: Very, very tasty!
customer_reviews.text: I have run into many people that cannot take fish oil or are vegans. So, I tried ordering this to see if it is a good substitute. While I cannot compare this to fish oil, I will say that it tastes great! Note: The suggested dose is 2 gummies.
customer_reviews.author: ThrillerReader

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Our kids take these without complaint. We bought them as a boost for our ADHD kids, and although they are a good dose for most they are not dosed at a high enough level for ADHD therapy.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Tasting...
customer_reviews.text: but don’t contain the amount of omega 3s recommended in 2. So of course I have to eat more. They taste like gummy candy and I really don’t mind except that it will cost more. I am just so over the fishy smell and fishy burps of the soft gels—no matter the brand.
customer_reviews.author: dbest57

customer_reviews.title: The most disgusting tasting gummies I've ever popped in
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how anyone can sell "chewable" gummies with such disgusting taste. Its as if you're licking a bar of metal that was sitting outside in the garage. I think I will throw the entire bottle away and take a writedown.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It works well for me so much so that I purchased a set for my sister. She loves the product as well. The added benefit is that you don’t have to take a pill 💊
customer_reviews.author: Laverne

customer_reviews.title: Lemony chews.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure how much I would be able to stomach chewing this because I don’t like fish and I was afraid they may be a little overwhelming however they’re actually not bad. They have no fishy taste nor smell like the fish oil capsules.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry&Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Great taste. Easy to take.
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of swallowing those big fat fish oil pills so I've decided to go with the chewable route. These tastes great. They're a great price, and I'll probably subscribe and save on my next purchase with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, easy to chew . I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I found these vitamins. I just have a hard time remembering to take my vitamins and now I can’t forget because then my after dinner treat. They are delicious and melt in your mouth good. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rubin

customer_reviews.title: Came without ice pack
customer_reviews.text: Came without ice pack. The first one I ordered had one.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: No fishy aftertaste and they taste like candy
customer_reviews.text: I have MS and omega-3 is really good for me. This is far superior than taking those big pills that leave a fishy taste long after you swallow them. I’m pleased they come in a big bottle because I really need this vitamin.
customer_reviews.author: ba p mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Got these for my kids.
customer_reviews.text: My boys will take these gummy omegas, but will not take non gummy ones at all. They like these too. I don't blame them for not taking the big soft gel kind. I don't like those either, but the gummy ones go down no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Can't complain
customer_reviews.text: Th le one thing about gummy vitamins is that you're more likely to take them since they taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Gary Kolb

customer_reviews.title: Omega 3
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this product as it is easy on her stomach. She cannot use standard fish oil capsules so these were a great alternative. Delivered to the door in short order. Always fresh and tasty. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Good, if not for the weird 'plastic' balls in some of them
customer_reviews.text: These gummies are fine, but every 5th dose or so I bite into a hard ball of some beyond viscous non-chewy substance that I end up having to spit out. Other than that, they're awesome
customer_reviews.author: sparrowhawkes

customer_reviews.title: Customer for life!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not my favorite flavor but it’s not bad either! I know I’m getting the nutrients my body is lacking! I love that!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Taste good
customer_reviews.text: They taste good can't say how well they work. I got tired of getting supplements that didn't pack a punch! Once you find something that does pack a punch you wonder if what you were taking really did anything!
customer_reviews.author: curlydaman

customer_reviews.title: I only use Vitafusion brand gummy vitamins
customer_reviews.text: The Vitafusion brand stands for quality. Since I have difficulty swallowing vitamins since my neck surgery, the flavorful, chewable Vitafusion brand has all the virtues I need to maintain strong bones, and vitamins that taste great and have no reflux.
customer_reviews.author: Winyan Wasaka

customer_reviews.title: It is not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking it for a month now and I feel no effect or difference whatsoever. However, the taste is good, but what I do not like in addition to the taste is that it is too sugary and contains a lot of grams of sugar. I would recommend sticking to Dr. Tobia's omega-3 fish oil tablets, nature valley, or Kirkland fish oil from Costco than these, personally. I would not buy vitafusion's omega-3 gummies again, though.
customer_reviews.author: A through Z Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: Great product and best price around.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great price. Feel better when I take them. Cholesterol was down after taking these for 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels L.

customer_reviews.title: Easier to take than regular fish oil.
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I'm super sensitive to smells and tastes, but need to get those omega-3s. These gummies do NOT smell or taste like fish. I wouldn't say they're delicious, but they make it easier to get the nutrients in. Hence the five stars . . . I wanted to be able to get them down and I did, without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: C.T. Rhames

customer_reviews.title: A decent way to get your Omega 3
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying the Omega 3 squeeze packets, but Amazon no longer carries the tropical flavor, so I tried these instead. They taste fine and are not too gummy/chewy. I have had no problem with fishy burps or aftertaste. Be aware that two gummies equal one dose. I wish the tropical flavor squeeze packets would return, but these are a fine substitute.

customer_reviews.title: easy to take Omega 3s
customer_reviews.text: I take enough pills..so gummies are my choice for vitamins and omega 3s...taste great..and enjoyable.

customer_reviews.title: Really good. I'd get these again.
customer_reviews.text: First off, mine came in perfect condition, which is always nice. Also I get no fishy flavor or aftertaste from these at all. The flavor is what it says and the texture is a nice normal gummy candy texture.

customer_reviews.title: Strong fish flavor - too strong - tossed them out ...
customer_reviews.text: Strong fish flavor - too strong - tossed them out, and called Vitafusion to let them know. Their other products are okay.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes not great
customer_reviews.text: I’m not crazy about the taste. I swear it has a fishy flavor. Not desirable in a chewable vitamin.

customer_reviews.title: The convenience of gummie vitamin allows me to chew, avoiding having to swallow big capsules.
customer_reviews.text: I hate swallowing capsules, gummies allow me to take all my vitamins without the hassle of drinking tons of water to get the capsules down.

customer_reviews.title: Great way to take your sypplements!

customer_reviews.title: YUM

customer_reviews.title: Superior Brand and product!
customer_reviews.text: Superior product and use these as my daily choice because the help me absorb the Omega better than normal. Excellent product and the gummies are yummies! They dissolve and absorb.

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several brands, and this one tastes the best. There is no fishy aftertaste.

customer_reviews.title: Beware they changed this product!

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great way to get some extra omega 3 into your diet.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet treat, no issue trying to swallow
customer_reviews.text: These taste really good and give me a good daily dose of Omega 3 which my eye doctor recommended for my dry eyes. Price is quite reasonable. Hate swallowing big capsules - seems that the older I get, the more these big capsules make me feel like I am choking.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect way to get your Omega-3

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and easy to swallow.
customer_reviews.text: Taste great and easy to swallow and a reasonable price.,

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me, I hate fish.

customer_reviews.title: Taste Great

I will definitely continue to order more of these.

customer_reviews.title: Seems expired

A few weeks later when I got about halfway through the bottle, they started dissolving in my mouth and tasting awful. I'm guessing something bad happened to the ones at the bottom of the bottle.

customer_reviews.title: Tasty fish gummy

customer_reviews.title: ... for my kids and my wife since they don’t like pills. They don’t taste very good though
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kids and my wife since they don’t like pills. They don’t taste very good though, so when I give it to my 3-year-old, I usually mix it in with a couple gummy vitamin Cs.

Compared to several other brands these are a far better value since the dosage is half of the others she tried. If you're looking for fish oil gummies these are your best option as far as I've seen.

customer_reviews.title: I Like this form of Omega 3

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!

product_meta.title: Vitafusion Omega 3 Gummies, 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Enjoy your Omega-3, without the fishy taste! vitafusion Omega-3 gummies are specially formulated for adults and contain vitamins A, C, D and E as well as 50 mg of Omega-3 EPA/DHA in each serving. Also known as polyunsaturated fatty acids, Omega-3 fatty acids play a role in growth and development [1]. Vitafusion Omega-3 comes in natural, berry lemonade flavors. Gluten Free. At vitafusion, we believe taste and nutrition can be fused together to deliver the best vitamin experience, ensuring it’s an easy and delicious part of your day. For over 12 years, we’ve been helping people to live happy and healthy lives with our gummy vitamins and supplements. Vitafusion is the only gummy vitamin brand with products that have been awarded the ChefsBest Excellence award for taste. [2] Anything is possible when great nutrition is your foundation. Take a fruitful step toward a healthier, happier world with America’s #1 gummy vitamin brand. Vitamin Better! [1] These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration.
